website_summaries.verdict: A decent camping chair option when you want to fit two or three people together outdoors.
pros: Large size gives the love seat plenty of space to seat two people comfortably
Folds up into a compact size with an included storage bag
cons: The rivets that hold the fabric to the metal can pop out after some use

customer_reviews.title: Too small for normal adults
customer_reviews.text: Check the dimensions very carefully... my husband and I are both around 5'7, 145lbs and the chair barely fits the two of us. We can sit in it, but definitely not comfortable. Fine for children, too small for adults. Owned a great double chair previously, but it split and ripped in two places after many many uses. Back to square one looking for a new double chair, probably have to give this one away, can't return it now, can't sit in it for more than 5 minutes without wanting to get out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Fritzin

customer_reviews.title: Good size open and folded; excellent value
customer_reviews.text: The two of us weigh a combined 270 lbs and we like to always be touching. So we like this smaller loveseat. The build quality is on par with other inexpensive folding chairs. I particularly like how small it is when folded. Larger people will like the bigger, higher quality, more expensive. I got one but returned it because it was too big when deployed and folded; otherwise I found it quite nice and worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: John McGehee

customer_reviews.title: Very weak chair ripped in 3 months
customer_reviews.text: After only 3 months of having the chair it already ripped apart. I am about 170lbs, I sat down and it just ripped appart.
customer_reviews.author: Olivasrebel

customer_reviews.title: Buy if you like to snuggle with your dogs :)
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for a camping loveseat for awhile, decided to try this based on reviews. Two adults (and a persistent snuggly dachshund) fit nicely. I️ recommend picking up a camping automan to make it REALLY feel like a couch. Feels shorter than most camping chairs but very comfy and fun to have with dogs who love to snuggle!
customer_reviews.author: Lobsterbisque

customer_reviews.title: Easy to tote and pretty compact when folded - not for large adults
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and when collapsed it's compact, easy to carry. It fits in the ski locker of my boat. I also use it when going to park festivals and events. My husband has no choice but to put his arm around me. Not recommended for larger adults. My husband weighs 200 and it's just a BIT small for him but he still uses his side and doesn't squish me (I'm 115).
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Kids Only
customer_reviews.text: Ok I didn’t check the measurements but had selected this based on reviews. Contrary to those reviews, this is NOT for two adults. Even if you want to cuddle. This would be good for children but I do not recommend it for two adults, no matter how close.
customer_reviews.author: M. Guerin

customer_reviews.title: Good Size lightweight Chair For On The Go!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is awesome and 2 adults fit great in it!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Jones

customer_reviews.title: very nice you guys
customer_reviews.text: Very,very nice you guys. you will not be sorry for this purchase. My husband weighs 250 lbs. and I weigh 133 lbs. we use them for all outdoor activities. You will love these chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Everything you could want.
customer_reviews.text: I argued with my partner about this chair r about three weeks before actually purchasing it. He wanted to spend the extra money to get a fancy name brand two-seater. Eventually he caved (me-1 partner-0) and we got this chair. We set it up in the living room before our trip, and my partner tried it first. He didn’t want to admit it, but this chair is INSANELY comfortable. Very sturdy, nice back placement, the whole nine. While camping, he repeatedly made a point of telling me that he was thankful I talked him into this chair over the others.
customer_reviews.author: Heron Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, easy and lightweight, love it!
customer_reviews.text: I do really like this! It is lightweight and that’s wonderful. It’s also comfortable and that was very important to me when doing my research and comparing/reading all the reviews on similar products. My husband and I aren’t necessarily small in stature. He weighs about 190 lbs and I weigh less than that. :-) We fit very comfortably. An excellent value for the price. I wish I’d found this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: JolieJoli

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the campers in your life
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and her boyfriend are just starting to go camping more and more and we have been giving them our stuff we used over the years and buying them other necessary items. My daughter stated that the first time they used it they loved it and still do every time they open the seats up to sit next to each other and enjoy their time in the peace and quite of nature. Sturdy and not super heavy - I wouldn't want to go on a long hike with it on my back but for short distances it is a great deal for the product
customer_reviews.author: Janice Chabot

customer_reviews.title: If you’re scared, don’t be!
customer_reviews.text: If you’re scared, don’t be! Despite being lightweight, easy to carry, shipped in 48 hrs- this chair set can hold the average sized adults with ease! Nearly 400lbs of weight was in these chairs and the seats didnt disappoint! Even in wind and rain, on grassy turf!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wyld

customer_reviews.title: Not As Comfortable As I'd Like...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the vendor did not have the 51"L item I wanted, and made good on the return of my costs. This is a nice idea (the double seat), but uncomfortable to sit on from the 'very beginning.' The individual seat area is not wide enough for me. I'd suggest you take an extra pillow to sit on, and perhaps this would be helpful over longer-term use (i.e. 2 hour outdoor concerts). Materials appear sturdy, and the carrying case is appropriate. Arrived timely, and pricing seemed competitive at approx $41 (for the 51"L).
customer_reviews.author: Prosperity

customer_reviews.title: Perfect camping accessory for Zeke and I
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cool camping chair. My doggie Zeke is a velcro pup who always loves to sit with me all the time!. This was the perfect solution for us. I am not sure if this would accommodate 2 adults. May perhaps be too congested. But this perfect for 2 kids or an adult and a kid or an adult a dog(like us!).
customer_reviews.author: Poonam

customer_reviews.title: Quality product... but
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product overall, but beware of the arms. They are very weak, and break with little force. Don’t boost up on the arms, and be careful even leaning on them. I like the chair, but the arms need to have better support.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Budge

customer_reviews.title: It's made for teens.
customer_reviews.text: I love my wife and all, but we're constantly fighting over thigh space with this chair and we're by no means fat. The seat is also super shallow, so your sitting positions are quite limited. We won't be using this again, maybe we'll let the kids use it. It was cheap, so I wasn't expecting much, thus I'm not that disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Jacob

customer_reviews.title: It's just the right size, and comfy
customer_reviews.text: What's not to love about a lightweight folding chair that lets you and your s/o cuddle up in front of the fire? We loved it and now have it sitting out on our patio as a semi permanent seating option.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Miller

customer_reviews.title: Small double seater. Not for adults
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace our Coleman Quad double seater. It does not compare in size and comfort. We kept it to use for our small children but this is not large enough for adults. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: KarenA

customer_reviews.title: Dog and human approved
customer_reviews.text: We love this. Got it for a lab who decided as a puppy he liked to be in a chair when camping. This gives him lots of room, or room for one of us to sit with him. Its definitely lower than our other chairs but that's been a good thing for him!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality/Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product tbh. My boyfriend and I purchased it for camping, and we are pretty happy. The back is pretty upright, but not so much that it’s uncomfortable. Overall quality chair. It isn’t that light, but it’s better than carrying two chairs!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: decently comfortable and folds up very easily
customer_reviews.text: decently comfortable and folds up very easily. its long enough to fit 2 adults and the cup holders are a nice feature. I wish it had some padding to increase the comfort level and maybe a headrest pad, but other than that i wouldnt change a thing.
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: Couple cuddles or single space
customer_reviews.text: I like this due to the double seat. Have used it to cuddle with the husband or to sprawl and read a good book. Great for bonfires and marshmallow roasting.
customer_reviews.author: Neoma W.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase and worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Great two person chair that folds up easily and comfortable to sit in too. This was a great find and addition to our camping needs. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Chair broke within 2 weeks of use.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap plastics cover the center screw. I weight 165 lbs and was sitting on it alone when it snapped and I fell.
customer_reviews.author: IG Twistedexposure

customer_reviews.title: Double chair
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted this for when they go camping. I've never seen a double chair like this but she's getting it for Christmas as one of her presents.
customer_reviews.author: evie51

customer_reviews.title: Youth Sized!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this and it is rather small. I think it is mis-labeled and should be described as youth-sized. It is good for 8 - 12 yo's. It is big enough for adults, but you are sitting kind of low and squished together. I'm not a huge person-- 5'10", 160 lbs. Its do-able, but it's not as comfortable as my old one which was full-sized. The quality seems fine--time will tell. We'll see how it holds up for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Hanan

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended. The seat is light so if no one is sitting on it and it's windy say goodbye. Don't leave drinks in it or food on the seat with no one sitting on the other side in windy areas. Great otherwise. It's not too close. Not too far.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent G.

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for price
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Very comfy, but being pretty inexpensive they skipped on a few pieces that wouldn't make it "heavy-duty" to me. Not the lightest chair but carrying case make it somewhat portable.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: its gonna be pretty snug. Its lower to the ground
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected. I had bought one a while back and I obviously don't know how to read dimensions, so this was lower in the back and smaller than my other double chair. If you are above 130lbs, its gonna be pretty snug. Its lower to the ground, so it can be a little hard to get out of. Quality is good though and easy to set up!
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Cicalo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to take to outdoor concerts
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I enjoy being able to sit close and huddle under a blanket when we go to our outdoor summer concerts. This chair works perfect for that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great seat!
customer_reviews.text: I received this chair a few days ago and although I haven't actually put it to use yet I can tell it's going to be exactly what I wanted. I have opened it and sat in it with my girlfriend and it fits us great. It is quite comfortable and appears to be well made. I have looked it over and all connections are snug and the fabric stitching is good. I think it will hold up fine for the light duty use it will see with us.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: its a simple lawn chair & isn't the best for long periods of time.  If possible, cover with a thick blanket or mattress topper.
customer_reviews.text: excellent well made product. was delivered well and in great condition. feels like a regular lawn folding chair and is OK for two healthy adult sized people. Use with a foot stool (and mattress topper to cover seats) and its comfortable for an hour or 2 with someone you want to sit close to.
customer_reviews.author: phil

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my brother and his fiance for Christmas. They are going traveling across the country and I figured it would be something nice for them to cuddle up around the fireplace with but yet would not take up much room, traveling. They loved it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this chair! I have been looking for a couple of years for one! Now I can sit in comfort with my dog while camping. It is very sturdy! And some say that the chair smelled bad. Mine was just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Mazel

customer_reviews.title: Decent but small
customer_reviews.text: Decent but a lot smaller than expected. It works well for me but I'm also 4 foot 10 and 110lbs. My boyfriend on the other hand who is 6ft barely fits in the thing with me.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Cuddle perfect
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this camping loveseat. Perfect to cuddle up close next to the fire or have the pup next to you on.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Great for any camping trip!
customer_reviews.text: I brought this chair to Bullards Bar for a camping trip and had to carry it a long way up mountains. It was surprisingly lightweight and held up well the entire trip. It is sturdy and even though it has two seats it is much better and lightweight than one seat chairs for camping. While at my camping trip other people kept trying to sit in my chair, I think they were jealous of my amazing chair!
customer_reviews.author: Mocha

customer_reviews.title: Broke on the first use
customer_reviews.text: Chair was not sturdy at all. Took with us to our camping trip and broke the first night. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: We tried it out tonight and love this chair - we are looking forward to watching ...
customer_reviews.text: We tried it out tonight and love this chair - we are looking forward to watching a sunrise and sharing a blanket! Seems as sturdy as our other camp chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: This chair was super comfortable. The price is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'3", 225 pounds. My girlfriend is shorter and weighs less. This chair was super comfortable. The price is amazing. I'm not expecting it to provide many years of useful service, but for the price it's great to sit side by side at the fire while camping.
customer_reviews.author: B. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the greatest! Had to buy 3 more after the original purchase since they are so hard to find and are a so useful and comfortable for two adults. Fold to about the size of a single chair.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Big double seat folds up fast and small
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! While it is big enough for two to sit, I enjoy having the extra room for one of the dogs to sit with me, or set my laptop on. It seems sturdy and folds up very small. I wish it had a pocket, though frankly I don't know where they would put it. I end up using the cup holders for my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Leblanc

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: It is really light weight and sturdy. I enjoy it. My daughter does too. I needed something to sit my daughter and me while we wait for her bus to come.
customer_reviews.author: Viviana Fones

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: We brought it in May and uses it 1-3 times a week for baseball and softball games. The chair have a weight capacity of 440 lbs. Our combined weight is 350 lbs max. The joint between the two seat showed wear in August but still usable with care. Now is completely broken with one post came out. Lasted 5 months. The last double folding chair we had lasted more than 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Not for adults
customer_reviews.text: More for a child. So will use it for my pooch. She has her own chair now.
customer_reviews.author: Earl K.

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. Seats are too small. Spend the extra money and get bigger seats
customer_reviews.author: P. VEASEY

customer_reviews.title: Lovely loveseat chair!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, sturdy loveseat chair, with plenty of room for 2, and a cupholder on each side!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and easy to put away.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fold. I wish the back were higher. That would make it more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon & Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Works but isn't super comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: It works and folds up pretty well, but it isn't super comfortable. Works well enough for smaller people, but anyone over probably 120 pounds won't enjoy it too much. It's nice to keep in the closet in case we run out of seating though.
customer_reviews.author: The Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why people say its too small. Its the perfect size for me and my wife. I am 5 ft 11 175 and she is 5ft 4 130 and we both fit comfortably. We can finally snuggle up in a blanket by the campfire together.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Needed an outdoor seating for us and this is what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Not bad chair for the price 💲
customer_reviews.text: Great folding love seat chair for two. Not super confortable but great gor the price.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great cuddle chair, but low quality
customer_reviews.text: After using it a couple times the legs started to come apart. But other than that it’s very comfortable and great for cuddling around a camp fire
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Lopes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift. We take this camping everywhere! For reference, my boyfriend and I weigh a combined 300 lbs, and it holds up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Julie W.

customer_reviews.title: Great for siblings.
customer_reviews.text: This is great for siblings who need to share a device while away from home.
customer_reviews.author: mrsmarple

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so I wouldn't have to carry multiple chairs. Very light and is great for my daughter and I. The cup holders are a great bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Howell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cheap, durable double-seater to take to an outdoor concert series, and I found it with this product. Handy carry bag comes with the product, and everything is excellent as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: dustin stokes

customer_reviews.title: Broke in a month
customer_reviews.text: Bought this based on all the 4.5 star reviews, but personally very disappointed. I only had this a month and it broke - a rivet under the left side of the seat popped out of the plastic housing when I was sitting in it by myself. I'm not all that heavy/certainly under the weight limit noted, for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Longtime member

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for two
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted , to be able to sit next to my lady in comfort
customer_reviews.author: Paul L. Nehring

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: This broke on the second use, way under weight limit. All the fabric and rivets popped off the center front support. Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: amehler

customer_reviews.title: small and poorly built
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have noted this chair is not very big. My wife and I are below average size (both weigh less than 150lbs.) and even so it feels like the 2 of us just fit. On top of that, it is not built very well. Within several uses the screw in one of the canvas arm rests ripped out. A few uses later the bolt in one of the plastic anchors pulled through. Sadly, don't think it's even going to survive one soccer season...
customer_reviews.author: Tim Villegas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love it, just what we needed for camping. Really comfy, better than our regular single camp chairs. Kids like it too.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy and Quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is GREAT! I bought three of them for the end of the year staff party just in case I didn't have enough chairs and they worked perfectly. They are well made and the cup holders are a nice touch. I can't believe they were only $25.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Nice chair. Shorter back than I realized but still enjoy it
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Drew

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair
customer_reviews.text: fits in the backseat of my car. nice to have at the car shows. just pop the seat out and me and the lady can sit down while everyone else stands.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Is a little small
customer_reviews.text: I am a big guy and I can fit in it, but it is on the smaller size. Will work as seating but not very comfortable for long periods.
customer_reviews.author: bill sheehan

customer_reviews.title: it is tight snug for 2 people
customer_reviews.text: me and wife are normal sized people and we have to sit straight in this without much room to move. I prefer it to be atleast 4-5 inches wider for space.
customer_reviews.author: rulzd5nd

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I waited so long for this chair to be delivered!
customer_reviews.author: JL89

customer_reviews.title: I' very pleased with my chair
customer_reviews.text: I really like my chair it has a little weight to it's cool. I put it to be deliver on my day off.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Was comfortable and easy to fold up and carry
customer_reviews.text: Fits 2 people of average to small size, or one bigger person. I weigh over 200 and sat in it while fishing. Was comfortable and easy to fold up and carry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Despite this being a double chair, it is very compact and light to carry! Perfect chair to keep in the car for various occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Survived a camping trip. I doubt it will make it more than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Isharp17

customer_reviews.title: ... a camping trip because I thought it would be good for my son and I to sit together
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a camping trip because I thought it would be good for my son and I to sit together. (he's one) I have found that sitting and holding him in just a single chair is really tight. It seems to be made really well. I can't wait to get more use out of it. I'm a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Canducci

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Way to small! Not very sturdy and not at all what I was expecting! Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Janella Ward

customer_reviews.title: I've had this chair a month now, seems to ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this chair a month now, seems to work really well haven't had any issues with it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend and I just got ours and we absolutely love it
customer_reviews.author: rebecca newman

customer_reviews.title: It actually fixes two average adults
customer_reviews.text: It looks great,and it packs away very easily. Easy to carry and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: maurice carter

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Was Looking For
customer_reviews.text: This chair is perfect for the outdoorsy couple. It was much roomier than I expected, so you could sit on it with someone you didn't really want to be snuggled up to and still feel comfortable. I would have given five stars but the chair broke after one of our more rowdier of friends leaned back on it with all his weight. That being said, I would gladly by a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Silcock

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for you plus one.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite seat. It doesn't leave my trunk. Only one thing to carry and me and my baby can sit together. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: Good Chair
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was a little bigger on the back it feels cramped when 2 people are actually sitting on it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Felt like it could have used more support in the middle but it sets up easy light weight. Doeant like to go back in the back very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Martin

customer_reviews.title: Roomy
customer_reviews.text: This was great 2 people could fit easily. Instead of packing 4 single chairs got away with only 2 of these.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Average quality "low profile" chair
customer_reviews.text: Sits fairly short. If you a shorter stature person this is the chair for you. Also doesn't lock in position.
customer_reviews.author: C. Blake

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my classroom. The bolt in the middle broke off without surviving one school year...😢 I’m not sure how this would hold adults.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yup
customer_reviews.text: It’s a chair. It does what it is supposed to. The material has held up well so far
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best 2 ppl chair
customer_reviews.text: Love this seat! Nice quality. We use this every week at the soccer fields. Very comfortable for 2ppl.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: A little stiff
customer_reviews.text: It’s not the most comfortable chair, but convenient for my spouse and I to use during get togethers.
customer_reviews.author: Chochacho

customer_reviews.title: Great for price, but delicate
customer_reviews.text: It's a great price. If you are rough, it WILL break. Mine lasted for about 2 days of regular/heavy use and the center rivit popped. I can fix it myself, and for the price it's a great buy. Just be very gentle or be ready to reinforce the chair yourself. It fits two regular adults well and is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: mcmulldp

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Its held up thus far but I would be surprised if it lasts a whole camping season
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Katz

customer_reviews.title: This is great. I have 6 and 3 year old daughters ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great. I have 6 and 3 year old daughters and they inevitably end up on me. Now we have enough room for everyone to be happy and comfortable everywhere we go. Good quality good price.
customer_reviews.author: White

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice chair for the beach! Love being able to lug only one for us instead of two separate chairs
customer_reviews.author: bwitham5

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Has held up for two softball seasons and 2 camping seasons so far. And I have little kids...
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

customer_reviews.title: So compact!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, can't believe how small it folds down. Can't wait for our camping trip to try it out!
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Bray

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sent it back very small and cheap feeling not comfortable at all
customer_reviews.author: Crystal and Scott Bumbalough

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this double lawn chair
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this double lawn chair. very sturdy, folds up nice to carry in trunk. Great for the beach or camping.
customer_reviews.author: djp

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace our old camp loveseat. This is smaller and less comfortable. Will work great for quick grab seating for a game or for kids/teens. I do like the bag it fits in.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: It’s good
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bit small but me and my bf are both skinny and 510” and 6 ft and it’s still a cool chair.
customer_reviews.author: Madi

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Sat in it once and the fabric already started to stretch. It will probably last one season. Update June 2, DO NOT GET THIS PRODUCT. It was used only twice before the rivets bent and broke making it useless. It is not worth the money paid.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Bust
customer_reviews.text: Broke the second time we used it! Way under the weight limit and we're pretty gentle. The hardware at the front center support failed. Keep trying to fix it, but no luck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5ft it is not comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: not made for adults if you are taller than 5.5ft it is not comfortable.

product_meta.title: Trademark Innovations 31.5"H Loveseat Style Double Camp Chair with Steel Frame
product_meta.description:
This steel frame double camp chair is the perfect seat for cozying up to the camp fire with that special someone. The easy set up makes it the perfect seating option for your favorite sporting event or camping trip. Comfortably seats two adults.
Steel Frame Measures 40"L x 22"W x 31.5" overall height

 * 440lb. Weight capacity
 * Polyester fabric seat and back
 * Folds for easy storage
 * By Trademark Innovations
feature_bullets: Steel Frame Measures 40"L x 22"W x 31.5" overall height
